data.prayer: God, guide the 714 believers in Uvs to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uvs, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Uvs, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Uvs, Mongolia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Uvs, Mongolia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Uvs do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kazakh people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, help the 714 believers in Uvs to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 81,986 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Uvs. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Uvs, Mongolia has a population of 82,700.

We estimate Uvs has 714 people who might know Jesus, 744 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 81,242 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 115 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Uvs, Mongolia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 81,986 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
